amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to require DOJ to report to Congress the effects of the recent federal government shutdown on DOJs efforts to disperse funding and services to victims to domestic violence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Underwood amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Ms. Underwood.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Underwood amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
